PropertyList.title: Douglas DC-3 C47

key.name: f/F
key.desc: Open/Close cowl flaps (right of the copilot; TRAIL=automatic)

PropertyList.text:
========== Startup ========== See Help | Tutorials.
========== Engines Autostart ========== 1 - Open Douglas DC-3 C47 dialog (Douglas DC-3 C47 > Options) 2 - Click on Autostart button 3 - Press key "s"
========== Procedures ========== Takeoff -> no flaps, rotate at 75 KIAS Climbout -> no flaps, 80 KIAS Cruise -> trim down, 165 KIAS Landing -> full flaps, 75 KIAS Landing gear handle -> unlock* Gear Lock, pull/push Gear Handle, lock* Gear Lock *: click on it
========== Dual Control ========== For a best experience, pilot and copilot need to be connected on the same server === Pilot select copilot === 1 - Open Pilot dialog (Douglas DC-3 C47 > Select MP-copilot) 2 - Select one copilot available 3 - Close Pilot dialog === Copilot select pilot === 1 - Open Copilot dialog (Douglas DC-3 C47 > Select MP-pilot) 2 - Select one pilot available 3 - Close Copilot dialog
